NHdT.text: Amino link with C6 spacer dT

dK.text: dK purine degenerate base (pairs with C or T)

dP.text: dP pyrimidine degenerate base (pairs with A or G)

dP+dK.text: dP+dK degenerate base mix (no mass added)

FAMdT.text: Fluorescein dT with C6 spacer (Fam dT)

TxRed.text: 5' Texas Red-X with C6 amino link
